entry.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
entry.content: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

entry.title: Aman-web-dev/Robin: Robin is a lightweight API testing platform built with Next.js and MikroORM. It allows developers to send and test HTTP APIs. seamlessly and view real-time responses. Built for speed and simplicity, Robin helps you test and debug APIs with ease.
entry.content: Robin is a lightweight API testing platform built with Next.js and MikroORM. It allows developers to send and test HTTP APIs. seamlessly and view real-time responses. Built for speed and simplicity, Robin helps you test and debug APIs with ease.

entry.title: fvena/consoleUI: A lightweight, high-performance UI toolkit for terminal and browser consoles. Create beautiful styled outputs with zero performance impact. ConsoleUI provides styling, colors, boxes, tables, spinners, and trees in a single tree-shakable package with zero dependencies, ensuring consistent results across all environments.
entry.content: A lightweight, high-performance UI toolkit for terminal and browser consoles. Create beautiful styled outputs with zero performance impact. ConsoleUI provides styling, colors, boxes, tables, spinners, and trees in a single tree-shakable package with zero dependencies, ensuring consistent results across all environments.

entry.title: khyatish14/bottom-sheet-stepper: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.

entry.title: hany226/vibe-coding-starter-pack-3d-multiplayer: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.

entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
entry.content: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

entry.title: error311/FileRise: 🗂️ Lightweight, self-hosted web-based file manager with multi-file upload, editing, and batch operations – built with PHP & JavaScript for seamless file and folder management (Docker & Unraid ready).

entry.title: theveug/peek: Peek is a lightweight WebRTC-based screen sharing app built with vanilla JS, Node.js, and Tailwind CSS. It lets users share their screen in real-time over a unique session link, with optional stream quality controls.
entry.content: Peek is a lightweight WebRTC-based screen sharing app built with vanilla JS, Node.js, and Tailwind CSS. It lets users share their screen in real-time over a unique session link, with optional stream quality controls.
